meta_title: SWMS Requirements Victoria: The 2026 Compliance Guide
meta_description: Definitive guide to SWMS requirements in Victoria under OHS Regulations 2017. Learn about High-Risk Construction Work, digital compliance, and Factory AI.
title: SWMS Requirements Victoria: The Definitive Compliance Guide for 2026

hero_image.alt: Hero image for SWMS Requirements Victoria: The Definitive Compliance Guide for 2026

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality hero image inside a modern manufacturing facility in Victoria. The scene features a diverse group of maintenance technicians and a safety manager. They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, high-visibility vests, and safety glasses. One technician is holding a rugged tablet (showing only the back of the device, no screen content visible) and appears to be discussing a digital workflow with the manager. In the background, there is industrial machinery like conveyors and motors, clean and well-lit. The atmosphere is professional, focused on safety and technology. No text or words in the image. Cinematic lighting. 8k resolution.
